metadata.Name: RuBQ
metadata.Description: A Russian Question Answering (QA) dataset for Wikidata. The dataset consists of questions, SPARQL queries, and answers. The questions were generated automatically from Wikidata and then paraphrased by volunteers.
Provider: National Research University Higher School of Economics
metadata.Paper Title: RuBQ: A Russian Dataset for Question Answering over Wikidata
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of the 1st Conference of the Asia-Pacific Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics and the 10th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing
metadata.Venue Name: 1st Conference of the Asia-Pacific Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics and the 10th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing
Affiliations: National Research University Higher School of Economics
metadata.Abstract: We present RuBQ, a Russian Question Answering (QA) dataset for Wikidata. The dataset consists of 3,550 questions, SPARQL queries, and answers, as well as 1,493 question paraphrases. The questions were generated automatically from Wikidata and then paraphrased by volunteers. We provide a detailed description of the dataset creation process and the dataset statistics. We also report the results of several QA baselines on our dataset. The dataset is publicly available at https://github.com/hsedt/rubq.
